Question & Options:
Which of the following statements is true regarding Raju Malhotra and Mr. Awasthi's involvement in the quiz competition?
Options:
A. Raju Malhotra was nominated for a quiz competition by the principal.
B. Mr. Awasthi is responsible for dividing students into different sections.
C. Raju Malhotra is in either A-section or C-section.
D. All of the above

What events transpire involving Raju Malhotra in the A-section?
Options:
A. Raju tries to enter the A-section despite being a poorly performing student
B. Raju develops feelings for a student from the A-section
C. Raju is celebrated for his academic achievements
D. Raju faces challenges due to his poor performance
Correct Answer: Raju tries to enter the A-section despite being a poorly performing student, Raju develops feelings for a student from the A-section, Raju faces challenges due to his poor performance

Options:
A. Rajan Malhotra
B. Raju
C. A-section students
D. All of the above
